text: URLs that start with /hubfs donâ€™t pass through image resizing. Prefix it with /hs-fs/hubfs and it will work

<@U25PYL3Q8> for images on the cdn2 domain you can use this `{{ widget.image|replace('/hubfs/' + hub_id, '/hub/' + hub_id + '/hubfs') }}?width=400` for images that use the portal's domain, you can use `{{ widget.image|replace('/hubfs/' , '/hs-fs/hub/' ) }}?width=400`
